## packet ssh-key delete

Deletes an SSH key

### Synopsis

Example:

packet ssh-key delete --id [ssh-key_UUID]



```
packet ssh-key delete [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -f, --force       Force removal of the SSH key
  -h, --help        Help for delete
  -i, --id string   UUID of the SSH key
```
